{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Siemens |model=SS2624 |revision=v1 |upc=609838003025 |ean= |asin=B000068WOI |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=05/03/2002 |manuf_country=Taiwan |manuf=SerComm |manuf_model=IP716E |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=P270HRB7,O6M-WM250 |ic_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=0.8 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Samsung |cpu1_model=S3C4510B |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=1 |fla1_brand=Hyundai |fla1_model=HY29F800TT-70 |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=4 |ram1_brand=ICSI |ram1_model=IC42S16100-7T |ram1_num=2 |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types=PCMCIA (16-bit) (non-standard connector),Parallel |expansion_pcmcia_num=1 |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module=BroMax WM250 |wi1_module_if=PCMCIA (16-bit) (non-standard connector) |wi1_chip1_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip1_model=ISL3873 |wi1_chip2_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip2_model=ISL3685 |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=b |wi1_ant_conn=unknown,RP-SMA |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand=Realtek |eth_chip2_model=RTL8019AS |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Kendin |sw_model=KS8995E |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=b |default_ssid=SpeedStream |default_ssid_regex=^SpeedStream$ |default_ip=192.168.254.254 |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }} [http://ec1.images-amazon.com/media/i3d/01/A/man-migrate/MANUAL000008834.pdf Manual]
The Siemens P/N on the label is 060-2624-001.
"4900FF10A" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :There is an '''Attansic''' AT7601F printer port controller on-board. :I am assuming the Flash used is a HY29F800TT-70.. The '''BroMax''' wireless module is using ISL3873IK. :"3752-32500010" is silkscreened on the wireless module's board.
[http://home.windstream.net/slashdot/2624/2624-setup01.html Router web interface screenshots]
The wireless interface OUI may be 00:02:DD ('''BroMax''').
